title: Commence work at various stages only after obtaining required approval to the plans from the Authority or clearances under the law
clause_text: Commence work at various stages only after obtaining required approval to the plans from the Authority or clearances under the law. To comply with any instructions, directions and orders by any Statutory Authority.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Commence work at various stages only after obtaining required approval to the plans from the Authority or clearances under the law.
